name: The 10th Energy Storage World Forum
content: The 10th Energy Storage World Forum and the 4th Residential Energy Storage Forum are featuring 60+ new researched topics addressed by speakers from 33 Utilities, 10 Regulators representing 22 countries. We are Europeâ€™s 1st conference dedicated to energy storage since 2010 thus offering more insight knowledge on the business case thanks to 9 past successful Forums with over 250 Utilities attending. Join us and we will help you to Build An Action Plan thanks to our uniquely designed session by the same name on the 11th May. Location: Berlin Dates: 4th Residential Energy Storage Forum 8-9 May 2017 and 10th Energy Storage World Forum 10-12 May 2017\. Find out more at www.energystorageforum.com
